features: Scientifical Hollow, Real Benefits. This orthopedic donut cushion for hemorrhoids with a scientific central hole (4.7''L x 2.56''W) is developed based on anatomy. Different from other hemorrhoid pillow with large holes on the market, this butt pillow with an appropriately sized hole supports the sit bone while ensuring the hemorrhoid area remains suspended, scientifically reducing the discomfort caused by the central collapse of the traditional large-hole cushion when sitting for a long time.

Ergonomic Designs, Maximum Comfort. This donut pillow for tailbone pain is crafted with 3 ergonomic designs. The ergonomic U-shaped cutout avoids coccyx compression and sciatic nerve pressure. The inclined support zone conforms to the thighs for blood circulation. The contoured shape fits the pelvis for support and effectively soothes soreness.

Relieve Sitting Pressure. Prolonged sitting easily causes coccyx compression and sciatic nerve pressure even hemorrhoids. This sciatica pain relief pillow corrects your sitting posture to promote thigh blood circulation and offers long-lasting comfort when long sitting. This seat cushion for office chairs and home use caters to the needs of men and women alike, which elevates your seating experience to a new level of comfort.

Premium Memory Foam, Never Flatten. The doughnut pillow adopts high-density memory foam instead of cheap polyurethane foam and offers lasting support and temperature-sensitive contouring to relieve bottom pressure and hemorrhoid pain. Choose AUVON coccyx cushion to start your comfortable and healthy sitting experience.

Breathable & Durable. Featuring a smooth and breathable cover of honeycomb mesh texture to prevent heat buildup, this ergonomic seat cushion can effectively reduce the risk of bedsores from long sitting. The cover is removable & washable for daily cleaning. The anti-slip bottom ensures sitting stability and safety. The dimensions: 17.2''L x 16.2''W x 3.1''H. Recommended Weight < 200 lb. Consult your healthcare provider before use.

productInformation.name: Product Care Instructions
productInformation.value: Foam core is non-washable., When cleaning the removable cover, zip it up to protect it from damage and follow the care label instructions. Be sure to machine wash cold separately using a gentle cycle and tumble dry on low heat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the price!
reviews.reviewText: Works GREAT in a wheelchair & is comfortable. Well worth the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very helpful pillow
reviews.reviewText: Because of having a number of surgeries on my leg, I developed issues from sitting. This pillow has been amazing! It has cut down on my pain and allowed my situation to get better. I would highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This pillow is really comfortable. I use it every where I go after m my transplant surgery. It makes the car ride more comfortable for my check-ups, I use it in the wheel chairs and waiting room chairs (believe me-you’ll need one!), and at home, it’s a really great buy. It holds it shape over time (two months of heavy use so far). I weigh 136 and it hasn’t flattened.Hint: put a fresh pillow case on it after each use outside your home to keep it clean. You’ll love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for bruised tailbone
reviews.reviewText: I bruised my tailbone, which was very inconvenient when I spend a lot of time driving in my car. I bought this cushion for my road trips, and it was the best purchase I’ve ever made! I Sit on it at home and in the car because my tailbone never hurts when I sit with this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's nice but could be better. here are s
reviews.reviewText: At it's thickest part, it's over 4" thick. This raises you up off your seat a good bit, obviously, but if you have limited room under your desk for leg placement, or the arms or headrest of your chair cannot be raised to compensate, you may find that the new seat height is not conducive to a good seating arrangement.Instead of looking at the center of my computer monitors, I was looking at the top.The memory foam is decent, but is VERY stiff; feels like sitting on a board, in firmness.All of these were helped by reducing the height by 1.5-2 inches with a really long, and very sharp, knife; cutting off from the flat bottom.I also opened up the hole in the center and cutout in the back at the same time.The top is very ergonomic and supportive of my hips. I am fairly skinny, at 5' 8" - 160# and the seat fits my bottom well. Someone with wider hips & bottom; the seat will not be wide enough.The seat cover is removable and washable and is a nice material with little nubbies on the underside to keep it from sliding around.The design is nice, it just didn't work for me without modification. But that was easy enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cushion wasn't soft enough for me and the hole in it was rather small. The comfort level that I need personally just wasn't there. On the positive side it looked well made though and delivery was fast.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's little tall but it's comfy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I lost about 45# so my tailbone sticks out. It really does a great job
This pillow was helpful after my surgery!!
